div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 61 Thessaly, 1966 Burial: c. 350 B.C. or later (Hackens) Contents: 20+ AR Larissa: 13+ dr. Locri Opuntii: 2 st. Boeotia: 5+ st. Disposition: dispersed Information from T. Hackens who states that the patination distinguishes this hd. from the very large Thessalian hoard of 1962, no. 52 above
